Plot: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.
Title: Unleashed
Actors: Jet Li, Morgan Freeman, Bob Hoskins, Kerry Condon
tomatoConsensus: Jet Li gets to emote in some emotionally awkward scenes, but the gritty fight sequences come through in what is Li's best English language film.
